name: MBlue Simple-Gray Buttons
description:
Gray buttons to integrate with Simple-Gray Theme.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
What it does:
 - makes all the NAV-BAR Buttons rounded and gray (small icons)
 - integrate with Simple-Gray
 - makes the buttons smaller
 - connect cut-copy-paste buttons
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Supported Extensions:
 Should support all the buttons.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes:
 You should use this together with the other Simple-Gray styles
 to integrate better. Remember to use small icons.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Integrates with:
 MBlue Simple-Gray Theme
 MBlue Simple-Gray Theme Ext-Support
 MBlue Simple-Gray Sidebar
 MBlue Simple-Gray Sidebar Ext-Support
 MBlue Simple-Gray Slim-Download
 MBlue Simple-Gray Slim-Extension
